title: Define ReviewDoc and QAReport Pydantic Schemas
description: Create comprehensive Pydantic v2 schemas for ReviewDoc (narrative output) and QAReport (compliance validation). Support 95-field affiliate intel structure, multi-tenant branding fields, and strict validation rules.

notes.note: Starting implementation of comprehensive ReviewDoc and QAReport schemas

✅ Comprehensive ReviewDoc and QAReport schemas implemented with 26 and 20 fields respectively. Includes multi-tenant support, 95-field affiliate intelligence integration, visual content management, SEO optimization, WordPress publishing metadata, and comprehensive QA validation framework.

history.details: Status changed from pending to in-progress
Status changed from in-progress to completed
